items.content_html: TodoApp is a simple and intuitive todo list application built with JavaScript. It allows users to add tasks, mark them as completed, and delete tasks from the list. The app also provides filtering options to view tasks based on their status (all, active, completed). It is designed to be lightweight, responsive, and easy to use.
items.title: bfriscic/TODOapp: TodoApp is a simple and intuitive todo list application built with JavaScript. It allows users to add tasks, mark them as completed, and delete tasks from the list. The app also provides filtering options to view tasks based on their status (all, active, completed). It is designed to be lightweight, responsive, and easy to use.

items.content_html: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.
items.title: lulusir/worker-webserver: Worker-webserver is a lightweight NPM package that allows you to implement a web server in your service worker using the fetch event. It allows you to intercept incoming requests, match them with a user-defined router, and execute a series of middleware functions to handle them.
